title: Azure Event Hub Consumer Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The Azure Event Hub Consumer collects events from the topic and partitions set in the agents' configuration. This section contains the following subsections: Azure Event Hub Consumer Agent Configuration Azure Event Hub Consumer Agent Input/Output Data and MIM Azure Event Hub Consumer Agent Events
